newsitem.title: USA: VALERO TO PAY $0.08/SHR DIV AFTER SPIN-OFF. [CORRECTED 08:56 GMT 2/8]
newsitem.headline: VALERO TO PAY $0.08/SHR DIV AFTER SPIN-OFF. [CORRECTED 08:56 GMT 2/8]

text.p: Valero Energy Corp said Friday it would pay an initial cash dividend on its common stock of $0.08 a share September 9 to shareholders of record on August 18 (corrects date from August 11).

Valero Energy is the new name of Valero's former Refining and Marketing Co, which was spun off as a new publicly-traded company when PG&E Corp closed the $1.5 billion acquisition of Valero's natural gas business Thursday.
The new company adopted the Valero Energy name and trades under the ticker symbol on the New York Stock Exchange.
Before the spinoff, the old Valero paid a regular quarterly dividend of $0.13 a share.
